Name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
Title: Tartaglia: Hydrospout
Source: Reward for inviting Tartaglia to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Abyssal Mayhem: Hydrospout
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1204]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1204] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S12042]</color> once.
End Phase: When $[A1204] is on the field and has this card equipped, deal 1 $[K5] to the opponent's active character if they have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112043]</color> attached.
(You must have $[A1204] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

C112043.Name: Riptide
C112043.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is defeated:</color> Apply Riptide to active character.\n(When <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1204]</color> is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112042]</color>, he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.)

C112042.Name: Melee Stance
C112042.Desc:
$[K100] dealt by character is converted to $[K102].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After the character uses $[K51]:</color> Apply $[K1005] to target character.
Character deals +1 DMG to target characters with $[K1005] attached.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After Skills are used against characters affected by $[K1005]:</color> Deal 1 $[K5] to the next opposing off-field character. (Twice per Round)

<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>ï¼šDMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K1005.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Riptide</color>
K1005.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached is defeated: </color>Apply Riptide to active character.\nWhen <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tartaglia</color> is in <color=#FFFFFFFF>Melee Stance</color>, he will deal additional DMG when attacking the character to which this is attached.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
